mobileResponsivenessTip: Consider optimizing image sizes and testing navigation for smoother performance on smaller screens.
loadingSpeedTip: Reduce the number of large images and external scripts to improve load time.
seoOptimizationTip: Ensure title tags, meta descriptions, and alt attributes are present for all images.
userExperienceTip: Streamline the homepage design and reduce clutter to enhance focus on key content.
bookingFlowTip: Make the booking button more prominent and consider adding a step-by-step guide for first-time users.
